abstract: College Basketball Roundup; University of Kentucky defeats University of Arkansas, 78-63, in Southeastern Conference final; other men's and women's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The No. 1 Wildcats trounced No. 21 Arkansas in the Southeastern Conference title game to improve to 34-0.

headline.main: Kentucky Remains Perfect, Winning the SEC Championship
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Remains Perfect, Winning the SEC Championship

snippet: The No. 1 Wildcats trounced No. 21 Arkansas in the Southeastern Conference title game to improve to 34-0.
